resources.string: This could be due to a lack of Internet connection . Please check if Your device is connected to the Internet . Internet or Wi-Fi network and try reloading the web page
Make a new bookmark and it will appear here. To do this, go to the desired site, go to the menu, click on Add to bookmarks
In the new version, the developer made improvements and changes. Updating the app is recommended for downloading and installing each user of this SOFTWARE. Download the update?
Sorry! Your device does not support voice input
Do you intend to go out? When you exit, all actions will be stopped and will not be saved in the browser.
Changes the theme only for the app itself
After disabling auto- rotation of the screen , the app will always open in portrait mode
Hide the status bar for easier viewing of content
The display will always be on regardless of the screen timeout settings
When this mode is enabled, Your data and browsing history are not saved in the apps memory and on the device, respectively
Incognito mode is enabled. To disable it go to settings
If you disable access to your location, sites will not be able to detect, for example, the weather in Your city, etc
The full version of the site
Displaying the full version of the site
The browser will not store passwords in its cache
If you cant see the displayed content clearly
When enabled, you can zoom in on objects on the site that you cant see well
This option does not work on all devices and may color web pages incorrectly
When this option is enabled the web page will load faster
Turbo mode is enabled. To disable it go to settings
When this option is enabled, the browser will cache the pages you have visited. When you visit the same page(s) again, the browser will load them from the cache
When enabled the browser will be able to transfer text when the web page is zoomed in
When enabled the browser will not load images and everything related to them
Important! Use with caution! If JavaScript is disabled, some sites will not work correctly
Without cookies, you will not be able to quickly log in to the site, and your settings will not be saved
